speech: I would like to know in which country you are because costs are different depending on your location. In which country are you?
Since the costs are different depending on your location, I would like to know in which country your currently reside. I would then be able to help your further.
The costs are different outside Europe and inside Europe. By telling me in which country you are going, I will then be able to tell you the charges related to the different card usages.
